sentences.en: " And to what do I owe this intrusion? "
sentences.cn: " 我有什么事需要你们闯到我家里来 吗 ?

sentences.en: He felt resentment at the intrusion.
sentences.cn: 他因受到干扰而十分恼火.

sentences.en: I demand an explanation for your rude intrusion upon my privacy.
sentences.cn: 我要求你对于无礼地侵扰我的私人生活的行为做出解释.

sentences.en: I felt it was a grotesque intrusion into our lives.
sentences.cn: 我感觉那是对我们生活的一种干扰，让人感到荒唐可气。

sentences.en: I must make it up to him for the awful intrusion of last night.
sentences.cn: 因为昨晚过分的打扰，我必须对他有所补偿。

sentences.en: Jim Skardon exploded at this apparent intrusion into his empire.
sentences.cn: 吉姆·斯卡登对于这些明显地侵犯其主管领域的行为暴跳如雷.

sentences.en: Many an evening was spoilt by their intrusion.
sentences.cn: 好多夜晚都被那些人的闯入破坏了.

sentences.en: Paul's mother was very angry at the intrusion.
sentences.cn: 保罗妈妈对这种干扰恼怒异常.

sentences.en: She simply laughed off her resentment at the intrusion.
sentences.cn: 她只是用笑声来掩饰她对别人打搅的不满.

sentences.en: Shopping - bag ladies are not very communicative and take general conversation as an intrusion.
sentences.cn: 携购物袋的女士们不大爱说话,她们把一般的交谈视为打扰.

sentences.en: Such intrusion has occurred at many locations in Florida and California.
sentences.cn: 这种侵入已经在佛罗里达和加利福尼亚的许多地方出现.

sentences.en: the unwelcome intrusion of the press
sentences.cn: 不受欢迎的新闻界的侵扰

sentences.en: Their intrusion into our private lives is unwarrantable.
sentences.cn: 他们侵扰我们的私生活是毫无道理的.

sentences.en: Their intrusion, though baffling and terrible , is not a random mischance.
sentences.cn: 他们的闯入, 虽然使人惊疑不定,却并不是飞来横祸.

sentences.en: They claim the noise from the new airport is an intrusion on their lives.
sentences.cn: 他们声称新机场的噪音侵扰了他们的生活。

sentences.en: With an apology for my intrusion, I was about to withdraw.
sentences.cn: 我为自己的唐突表示歉意, 我想退出.

trans.tran_cn: 闯入，打扰，（对某事的）干扰，干涉
trans.tran_en: when someone does something, or something happens, that affects your private life or activities in an unwanted way
